package com.situ.iolearning;

import java.io.File;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;

public class FileTest {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        File file1 = new File("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/HelloWorld.java");
        System.out.println(file1.isFile());
        System.out.println(file1.canRead());
        System.out.println(file1.canWrite());
        System.out.println(file1.length());
        System.out.println(file1.getAbsoluteFile());
        System.out.println(file1.getName());
        System.out.println(file1.isDirectory());
        System.out.println(file1.isFile());
        System.out.println(file1.isHidden());
        System.out.println(file1.lastModified());
        Date date = new Date(file1.lastModified());
        SimpleDateFormat sft = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyå¹´MMæœˆddæ—¥ HH:mm:ss");
        String str = sft.format(date);
        System.out.println(str);

        //File file2 = new File("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/fileclasstest");
        //if (!file2.exists()) {
        //    file2.mkdir();
        //}

        //file2.delete();//åˆ é™¤æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹

        //ä¸å¯ä»¥åˆ—å‡ºä¸‹ä¸‹ä¸€çº§æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­çš„å†…å®¹ã€‚
        File file3 = new File("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ");
        File[] files = file3.listFiles();
        //for (File file : files) {
        //    System.out.println(file);
        //}

        listAll("|--", file3);


    }

    //å¯ä»¥åˆ—å‡ºå­æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­å†…å®¹çš„æ–¹æ³•
    public static  void listAll(String head, File file) {
        File[] files = file.listFiles();//åˆ—å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€å±‚çº§çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸­æœ‰çš„æ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œæœ‰çš„æ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶
        for (File f : files) {//éå†æ•°ç»„
            System.out.println(head + f.getName());//æ‰“å°
            if (f.isDirectory()) {//åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰è¿™ä¸ªfileç±»å‹çš„å¯¹è±¡ f æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å°±å†è°ƒç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡ è‡ªèº«ã€‚å¹¶ä¸”è°ƒç”¨ä¹‹å‰ä¼ ä¸€ä¸ª tabï¼Œè¿™æ ·è¿™ä¸€æ¬¡çš„è°ƒç”¨æ‰“å°æ—¶å¤´éƒ¨å°±æ˜¯ tab + æ–‡ä»¶åäº†
                listAll("\t" + head , f);
            }
        }
    }
}

package com.situ.iolearning;

import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.IOException;

public class InputStreamTest {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        FileInputStream in = new FileInputStream("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/666.txt");

        byte[] arr = new byte[16];

        //è¿™ä¸ªå¤„ç†æ–¹å¼å¯èƒ½ä¼šæœ€åä¸€æ¬¡è¯»å–çš„å­—èŠ‚ä¸å¤Ÿ16ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´è¦†ç›–æ•°ç»„çš„æ—¶å€™ä¼šè¦†ç›–ä¸å…¨ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ€æœ‰ä¸€æ¬¡æ‰“å°æœ‰æ¦‚ç‡å‡ºç°ä¹‹å‰çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
        //while (in.read(arr) != -1) {
        //    //System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));
        //    String s = new String(arr);
        //    System.out.println(s);
        //}

        //å¤„ç†æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
        //ç¬¬1ç§è¡¨è¾¾å½¢å¼ï¼šï¼š
        //int len = 0;
        //while ((len = in.read(arr,0,arr.length)) != -1) {
        //    String s = new String(arr, 0, len);
        //    System.out.println(s);
        //}

        //ç¬¬2ç§è¡¨è¾¾å½¢å¼ï¼šï¼š
        int len = 0;

        }

        in.close();

    }
}

OutputStreamTest.java

package com.situ.iolearning;  
  
import java.io.FileOutputStream;  
import java.io.IOException;  
  
public class OutputStreamTest {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {  
        FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/out.txt");  
        String str = "helloJava";  
  
        byte[] arr = str.getBytes();    //String --> byte[] è¦å…ˆæ¢æˆ byte  
  
        out.write(arr,0,arr.length);    //æŠŠæ•°ç»„ arr ä¸­çš„ï¼Œä» 0å¼€å§‹ï¼Œæ•°ç»„æœ‰å¤šé•¿å°±å†™å…¥å¤šé•¿  
        out.close();    //å…³é—­æµ  
    }  
}

CopyFile.java é€šè¿‡è¾“å…¥æµè¾“å‡ºæµå®ç°å¤åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶åŠŸèƒ½

package com.situ.iolearning;  
  
import java.io.FileInputStream;  
import java.io.FileOutputStream;  
import java.io.IOException;  
  
public class CopyFile {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {  
        FileInputStream in = new FileInputStream("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/google.txt");  
        FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/google_new.txt");  
  
        int len = 0;  
        byte[] arr = new byte[128]; //ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨çš„ç¼“å†²æ•°ç»„  
        while ((len = in.read(arr)) != -1) {    //åªè¦æ²¡è¯»åˆ°æœ«å°¾å°±è¯»  
            out.write(arr,0,len);   //æŠŠarræ•°ç»„ï¼Œä»0 å¼€å§‹ï¼ŒæŠŠ len ä¸ªé•¿åº¦å†™å…¥  
        }  
  
        //å…ˆæ‰“å¼€çš„åå…³é—­  
        out.close();  
        in.close();  
  
    }  
}

package com.situ.iolearning;  
  
import java.io.FileReader;  
  
public class InputReaderTest {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {  
        //åˆ›å»ºæµ  
        FileReader in = new FileReader("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/google.txt");  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨æµ  
  
        int len; //ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨æ¯æ¬¡è¯»å–ä¹‹åè¿”å›çš„é•¿åº¦  
        char[] arr = new char[128]; //åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç”¨äºæš‚å­˜çš„æ•°ç»„  
  
        //read() æ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼æ˜¯è¿™æ¬¡è¯»å–çš„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¯»åˆ°æœ«å°¾ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› -1        
        //ä»è¾“å…¥æµä¸­æ¯æ¬¡è¯»å–128ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ï¼Œæ”¾å…¥åˆ°æ•°ç»„ä¸­ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¿”å›æ¯æ¬¡è¯»å–çš„é•¿åº¦(æ³¨æ„ï¼Œæœ€åä¸€æ¬¡è¯»å–çš„é•¿åº¦å¯èƒ½ä¸æ˜¯128)  
  
        while ((len = in.read(arr)) != -1) {    //  é¦–å…ˆç”¨ len æŠŠè¿™æ¬¡è¯»å–çš„é•¿åº¦å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶å°¾  
            //åˆšåˆšè¯»äº†å¤šå°‘çš„ä¸œè¥¿ï¼Œå°±æŠŠå¤šå°‘çš„ä¸œè¥¿ä»æ•°ç»„çš„0å·ä½ç½®å¼€å§‹å–å‡ºæ¥æ”¾åˆ°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸­  
            String str = new String(arr,0,len); //å­—ç¬¦æ•°ç»„ -> å­—ç¬¦ä¸²  
            System.out.print(str);  
        }  
        //å…³é—­æµ  
        in.close();  
    }  
}

CopyFile_CharStream.java å®ç°å¤åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶åŠŸèƒ½

package com.situ.iolearning;  
  
import java.io.FileReader;  
import java.io.FileWriter;  
  
public class CopyFile_CharStream {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {  
        //åˆ›å»ºæµ  
        FileReader in = new FileReader("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/google.txt");  
        FileWriter out = new FileWriter("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/google_new2.txt");  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨æµ  
        int len;  
        char[] arr = new char[128];  
        while ((len = in.read(arr)) != -1) {  
            out.write(arr,0,len); //åˆšåˆšè¯»äº†å¤šå°‘é•¿åº¦(len)çš„çš„ä¸œè¥¿ï¼Œå°±ä»æ•°ç»„çš„ 0 å·ä½ç½®æ‹¿å‡ºå¤šå°‘ä¸œè¥¿å†™  
        }  
        //å…³é—­æµ  
        in.close();  
        out.close();  
    }  
}

CopyFile_CacheStream.java

package com.situ.iolearning;  
  
import java.io.*;  
  
public class CopyFile_CacheStream {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {  
        BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/google.txt"));  
        BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/google_new3.txt"));  
  
        int len;  
        char[] arr = new char[128];  
        while ((len = in.read(arr)) != -1){  
            out.write(arr,0,len);  
        }  
  
        in.close();  
        out.close();  
    }  
}

ReadLineTest.java

package com.situ.iolearning;  
  
import java.io.BufferedReader;  
import java.io.FileReader;  
  
public class ReadLineTest {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {  
        BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("/Users/wangwenpeng/Code/JavaDeveloper/basic/å±±ä¸œ/readbyline.txt"));  
  
        int len;  
        String line = null;  
        while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {  
            System.out.println(line);  
        }  
  
        in.close();  
    }  
}

EatThread.java

package com.situ.threadlearning.basic;  
  //åƒé¥­çº¿ç¨‹çš„å®šä¹‰
public class EatThread extends Thread{  
    @Override  
    public void run() {  
        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {  
            System.out.println("åƒé¥­");  
            //ç°ä»£å¤„ç†å™¨è¿è¡Œé€Ÿåº¦å¤ªå¿«äº†ï¼Œå¤„ç†ç®€å•çš„forç›´æ¥å®Œæˆäº†ï¼Œä¸ç¡çœ ä¸€ä¸‹éƒ½æ¥ä¸åŠä¸”æ¢ä¸‹ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹  
            try {  
                Thread.currentThread().sleep(100);  
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {  
                throw new RuntimeException(e);  
            }  
        }  
    }  
}

ThreadClass.java

package com.situ.threadlearning.basic3;  
  
public class ThreadClass extends Thread{  
    public void run() {  
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {  
            System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "\tç¬¬" + i + "æ¬¡");  
            try {  
                Thread.currentThread().sleep(100);  
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {  
                throw new RuntimeException(e);  
            }  
        }  
    }  
}

ThreadClass2.java

package com.situ.threadlearning.basic3;

public class ThreadClass2 extends Thread{
    private Thread thread;
    public ThreadClass2() {
    }

    public ThreadClass2(Thread thread) {
        this.thread = thread;
    }

    public void run() {
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "\tç¬¬" + i + "æ¬¡");


            /*
             * å½“è¿è¡Œåˆ° ç¬¬ 5 æ¬¡æ—¶ï¼Œå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹(thread222)ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œthread111.join()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œ
             * è¿™ä¼šé˜»å¡ thread111.join() çš„è°ƒç”¨çº¿ç¨‹(thread222)ï¼Œ
             * thread222 çº¿ç¨‹é˜»å¡ï¼Œç„¶åè½¬è€Œå»æŠŠ thread111çº¿ç¨‹ è¿›è¡Œå®Œï¼Œç„¶åå†æ‰§è¡Œçº¿ç¨‹ thread222
             *
             * */
            try {
                if (i == 4) {
                    thread.join();
                }
                Thread.currentThread().sleep(3);
            }catch (InterruptedException e) {
                throw new RuntimeException();
            }
        }
    }
}

package com.situ.threadlearning.basic2;  
  
public class Test {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        //åˆ›å»º Runnable æ¥å£å®ç°ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡  
        Eat eat = new Eat();  
        Drink drink = new Drink();  
        Chat chat = new Chat();  
        //ä½¿ç”¨ä¼ å…¥Runnableæ¥å£å®ç°ç±»å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹å¼ åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹å¯¹è±¡  
        Thread t1 = new Thread(eat);  
        Thread t2 = new Thread(drink);  
        Thread t3 = new Thread(chat);  
        Thread t4 = new Thread(new Runnable() {//ä½¿ç”¨åŒ¿åå†…éƒ¨ç±»åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå®ç° Runnableæ¥å£é‡å†™runçš„æ¥å£å®ç°ç±»  
            @Override  
            public void run() {  
                for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {  
                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "\tå”±æ­Œ");  
                    //ç°ä»£å¤„ç†å™¨è¿è¡Œé€Ÿåº¦å¤ªå¿«äº†ï¼Œå¤„ç†ç®€å•çš„forç›´æ¥å®Œæˆäº†ï¼Œä¸ç¡çœ ä¸€ä¸‹éƒ½æ¥ä¸åŠä¸”æ¢ä¸‹ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹  
                    try {  
                        Thread.currentThread().sleep(100);  
                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {  
                        throw new RuntimeException(e);  
                    }  
                }  
            }  
        });  
          
        t1.start();  
        t2.start();  
        t3.start();  
        t4.start();  
        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName());  
  
    }  
}

package com.situ.threadlearning.basic4;  
  
import java.util.concurrent.Callable;  
  
  
  
/*  
* å®šä¹‰å®ç° Callableæ¥å£ï¼Œé‡å†™ call()æ–¹æ³•çš„çº¿ç¨‹å®šä¹‰ç±»  
* ä½¿ç”¨ç±»æ³›å‹æ¥å£ï¼Œæ³›å‹å‚æ•°ä¼šå½±å“è¿™ä¸ªæ¥å£ä¸­çš„è¿”å›å€¼  
* æˆ‘ä»¬è¦å®šä¹‰çš„æ˜¯æ±‚å’Œçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ³›å‹å‚æ•°ä¸­å†™ Integer*  
* public interface Callable<V> {  
*  
*    V call() throws Exception;  
* }  
*  
* æ–¹æ³•ä¸­æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ int ç±»å‹ï¼Œå…¶å®åœ¨è¿”å›çš„æ—¶å€™è¿˜åŒ…å«  
* ä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªåŠ¨è£…ç®±çš„æ“ä½œã€‚  
* */  
public class SumNum implements Callable<Integer> {  
    @Override  
    public Integer call() throws Exception {  
        int sum = 0;  
        for (int i = 0; i < 101; i++) {  
            sum = sum + i;  
        }  
        return sum;  
    }  
}

CallableTest.java

package com.situ.threadlearning.basic4;  
  
import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;  
import java.util.concurrent.FutureTask;  
  
public class CallableTest {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        SumNum sumNum = new SumNum();  
        FutureTask<Integer> task = new FutureTask<>(sumNum);  
        Thread thread = new Thread(task);//åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹å¯¹è±¡  
        thread.start();//å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹å¯¹è±¡  
  
        try {  
            Integer sum = task.get();//å€ŸåŠ©taskç±»å¯¹è±¡è·å–è¿”å›ç»“æœ  
            System.out.println(sum);  
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {  
            throw new RuntimeException(e);  
        } catch (ExecutionException e) {  
            throw new RuntimeException(e);  
        }  
    }  
}

package com.situ.threadlearning.basic5;  
  
public class SumNum implements Runnable {  
    @Override  
    public void run() {  
        int sum = 0;  
        for (int i = 0; i < 101; i++) {  
            if (i % 2 == 0) {  
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + ":" + i);  
            }  
        }  
    }  
}

package com.situ.threadlearning.threadsync.sellticket_runnable;  
  
public class Window implements Runnable{  
    private int count = 100; //100å¼ ç¥¨  
  
    @Override  
    public void run() {  
        while (true) {  
            //ä½¿ç”¨ syncchronizedä»£ç å—ä½¿å¾—ä»£ç å—ä¸­çš„å†…å®¹æ˜¯ä½œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•´ä½“è¿è¡Œçš„  
            //ä¸€æ—¦è¿è¡Œåˆ°è¿™ä¸ªå—ï¼Œå°±ä¸å…è®¸å…¶ä»–çš„çº¿ç¨‹å¯¹è¿™ä¸ªå—æ“ä½œ  
            synchronized (this) {  
                if (count > 0) {  
                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "ç¬¬" + count + "å¼ ç¥¨");  
                    count--;  
                }else {  
                    break;  
                }  
            }  
  
            try {  
                Thread.sleep(3);  
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {  
                throw new RuntimeException(e);  
            }  
  
        }  
    }  
}

public class Window2 implements Runnable {
	private int count = 100;
	@Override
	public void run() {
		while(true) {
			sale();
			if(count <= 0) {
				break;
			}
			try {
				Thread.currentThread().sleep(100);
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}
	
	//åŒæ­¥æ–¹æ³•  è¯¥æ–¹æ³•è¿è¡Œå®Œæ¯•ä¹‹åï¼Œå…¶ä»–çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ‰ä¼šè¿è¡Œ
	public synchronized void sale() {
		if(count > 0) {
			System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "å–ç¬¬" + (count--) + "å¼ ç¥¨");
		}
	}
}

Thread å’Œ Runnable

package com.situ.threadlearning.threadsync.locklocker;  
  
import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;  
  
//çº¿ç¨‹ä»»åŠ¡çš„å®šä¹‰ç±»  
public class LockLocker implements Runnable{  
    private int count = 100;  
  
    //ä½¿ç”¨ç»™å®šçš„å…¬å¹³ç­–ç•¥åˆ›å»ºReentrantLockçš„å®ä¾‹  
    private ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock(true);  
  
    @Override  
    public void run() {  
        while (true) {  
            try {  
                //è¢«é”æ¡†èµ·æ¥çš„è¿™æ®µä»£ç æ¯æ¬¡åªèƒ½æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹å¯¹èµ„æºè¿›è¡Œè®¿é—®  
                lock.lock();//è¿è¡Œè¿™æ®µä»£ç æ—¶è¦å…ˆåŠ é”  
                if (count > 0) {  
                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "ç¬¬" + count + "æ¬¡");  
                    count--;  
                }else {  
                    break;  
                }  
                Thread.sleep(3);//ç¡çœ ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢è¿è¡Œé€Ÿåº¦è¿‡å¿«çœ‹ä¸æ¸…  
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {  
                throw new RuntimeException(e);  
            }finally {  
                lock.unlock();//æ— è®ºå¦‚ä½•ï¼Œfinallyä¸­çš„å†…å®¹éƒ½ä¼šè¿è¡Œï¼Œè‚¯å®šä¼šé‡Šæ”¾é”  
            }  
        }  
    }  
}
package com.situ.threadlearning.threadsync.locklocker;  
  
public class Test {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        LockLocker locker = new LockLocker();//çº¿ç¨‹ä»»åŠ¡å®šä¹‰ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡  
        //æ ¹æ®çº¿ç¨‹ä»»åŠ¡å¯¹è±¡åˆ›å»º3ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹  
        Thread t1 = new Thread(locker);  
        Thread t2 = new Thread(locker);  
        Thread t3 = new Thread(locker);  
  
        Thread.currentThread().setName("ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹");  
        t1.setName("t1:");  
        t2.setName("t2:");  
        t3.setName("t3:");  
  
        t1.start();  
        t2.start();  
        t3.start();  
    }  
}

public class Lock {  
    static Object objA = new  Object();  
    static Object objB = new  Object();

package com.situ.threadlearning.threadsync.deadlocker;  
  
public class AThread extends Thread{  
    public void run() {  
        while (true) {  
            synchronized (Lock.objA) {  
                synchronized (Lock.objB) {  
                    System.out.println("Athread.......");  
                }  
            }  
        }  
    }  
}
package com.situ.threadlearning.threadsync.deadlocker;  
  
public class BThread extends Thread{  
    public void run() {  
        while (true) {  
            synchronized (Lock.objB) {  
                synchronized (Lock.objA) {  
                    System.out.println("Bthread.......");  
                }  
            }  
        }  
    }  
}

PrintNum.java

package com.situ.threadlearning.threadcommunication;  
  
  
//ç”¨äºå®šä¹‰è¿™ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹çš„ä»»åŠ¡ï¼š"æ‰“å°æ•°å­—"  
public class PrintNum implements Runnable{  
    private int num = 1;  
  
    @Override  
    public void run() {  
        while (true) {  
              
            /**  
             * ä½¿ç”¨synchronizedä»£ç å—ï¼Œä½¿å¾—ä»£ç å—ä¸­çš„å†…å®¹æˆä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•´ä½“ï¼Œ  
             * å½“ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹è¿è¡Œåˆ°è¿™é‡Œçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹ä¸å®¹ä¾µçŠ¯ï¼  
             *   
             * Objectçš„å­—èŠ‚ç æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å”¯ä¸€çš„.å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥å½“å”¯ä¸€çš„"é’¥åŒ™"  
             */            
             synchronized (Object.class) {  
                  
                //é€šçŸ¥å…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹è¿›å…¥å”¤é†’çŠ¶æ€(é€šçŸ¥ä»–ä»¬å¯ä»¥ç­‰ç€æˆ‘ç”¨å®ŒCPUä¹‹åæ¥æŠ¢)  
                Object.class.notify();        
                  
                //æ‰“å°æ•°ç»„çš„æ“ä½œ  
                if (num <= 100) {  
                    System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "ç¬¬" + num + "æ¬¡");  
                    num++;  
                }else {  
                    break;  
                }  
  
                /*  
                * æ­£å¸¸æ‰“å°å®Œæˆä¹‹åè¦åˆ°è¿™é‡Œæ¥è°ƒç”¨ wait()ï¼Œ  
                * ä½¿ä¹‹å½“å‰è¿›ç¨‹æŒ‚èµ·å¹¶æ”¾å¼ƒCPUï¼Œ  
                * ç­‰å¾…å…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹ä½¿ç”¨notifyæ–¹æ³•å”¤é†’  
                * */                
                try {  
                    //æ‰“å°å®Œä¸€æ¬¡æ•°å­—ä¹‹åè®©å½“å‰è¿›ç¨‹è¿›å»ç­‰å¾…çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œé‡Šæ”¾äº†å…¬å…±èµ„æºå’ŒObject.clas  
                    Object.class.wait();  
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {  
                    throw new RuntimeException(e);  
                }  
  
            }  
        }  
    }  
}

Server.java

package com.situ.netcoding.socket1;  
  
import java.io.InputStream;  
import java.net.InetAddress;  
import java.net.ServerSocket;  
import java.net.Socket;  
  
public class Server {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {  
        //åˆ›å»ºç›‘å¬å¥—æ¥å­—ï¼Œç›‘å¬æœ¬åœ°çš„60000ç«¯å£  
        ServerSocket serverSocket = new ServerSocket(60000);  
  
        System.out.println("æœåŠ¡å™¨å·²ä¸Šçº¿...");  
  
        while (true) {  
            //è·å–å·²è¿æ¥çš„å¥—æ¥å­—---è°ƒç”¨ acceptçš„ç¨‹åºä¼šä¸€åªå¡åœ¨è¿™é‡Œï¼Œç›´åˆ°æœ‰è¿æ¥æ‰è¿”å›  
            Socket socket = serverSocket.accept();  
  
            //è·å–è¿æ¥ä¸Šå¥—æ¥å­—çš„ä¸»æœºçš„åœ°å€  
            InetAddress inetAddress = socket.getInetAddress();//Returns the address to which the socket is connected.  
            String ip = inetAddress.getHostAddress();//è¿”å›IPåœ°å€çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å½¢å¼  
  
            //è·å–è¿æ¥ä¸Šå¥—æ¥å­—çš„ä¸»æœºçš„ç«¯å£å·  
            int port = socket.getPort();  
            System.out.println(ip + ":" + port + "å·²è¿æ¥");  
  
            int len = 0;  
            byte[] arr = new byte[128];//ç”¨äºåšè¾“å…¥æµçš„ä¸€ä¸ªç¼“å†²æš‚å­˜æ•°ç»„  
            InputStream in = socket.getInputStream();//ä»å¥—æ¥å­—ä¸­è·å–è¾“å…¥æµ  
  
            //åªè¦æ²¡æœ‰è¯»åˆ°æœ«å°¾ï¼Œå°±ä¸€ç›´æ‰“å°  
            while ((len = in.read(arr)) != -1) {//æŠŠæµä¸­çš„å†…å®¹è¯»å¸¦arrä¸­ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¿”å›æœ¬æ¬¡è¯»åˆ°çš„é•¿åº¦  
                String str = new String(arr,0,len);//è¯»åˆ°å¤šå°‘ä¸ªå°±æŠŠå¤šå°‘ä¸ªè½¬æ¢æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œ  
                System.out.println(str);//å¹¶ä¸”æ‰“å°  
            }  
  
            //å…³é—­å¥—æ¥å­—  
            socket.close();  
        }  
    }  
}

Client.java

package com.situ.netcoding.socket1;  
  
import java.io.OutputStream;  
import java.net.Socket;  
import java.util.Scanner;  
  
public class Client {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {  
        //åˆ›å»ºå¥—æ¥å­—ï¼Œåªè¦å’ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸï¼Œå°±ä¼šè¿”å›  
        Socket socket = new Socket("127.0.0.1", 60000);  
  
        byte[] arr = null;  
        //è·å–IOæµ  
        //åˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªè¾“å‡ºæµï¼Œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ˜¯å¤„ç†å®Œç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥åï¼Œä»å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¾“å‡ºçš„  
        OutputStream out = socket.getOutputStream();  
  
        while (true) {  
            //è·å–ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥  
            Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);  
            String str = scanner.next();  
            //å¦‚æœè¾“å…¥çš„æ˜¯ exitï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥ è·³å‡ºäº†å¾ªç¯  
            if (str.equals("exit")) {  
                break;//è·³å‡ºwhileå¾ªç¯  
            }  
  
            //æŠŠç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥çš„å†…å®¹è½¬åŒ–æˆå­—èŠ‚ï¼Œç„¶åæŠŠè¿™äº›å†…å®¹å†™åˆ°è¾“å‡ºæµä¸­  
            //å¦‚æœæ˜¯ breakè·³å‡ºäº†whileå¾ªç¯ï¼Œæœ¬æ¬¡å°±æ²¡æœ‰å‘è¾“å‡ºæµä¸­å†™å…¥ä»»ä½•æ•°æ®ï¼ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨é‚£è¾¹å°±å¯ä»¥è¯»åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶æœ«å°¾è¿”å›-1äº†  
            out.write(str.getBytes());  
        }  
  
        //å…³é—­å¥—æ¥å­—  
        socket.close();  
    }  
}

ServerThread_Version.java

package com.situ.netcoding.socket1;  
  
import java.io.InputStream;  
import java.net.InetAddress;  
import java.net.Socket;  
  
public class ServerThread_Version extends Thread{  
    private Socket socket;  
    public ServerThread_Version(Socket socket) {  
        this.socket = socket;  
    }  
  
    @Override  
    public void run() {  
        try {  
            //è·å–è¿æ¥ä¸Šå¥—æ¥å­—çš„ä¸»æœºçš„åœ°å€  
            InetAddress inetAddress = socket.getInetAddress();//Returns the address to which the socket is connected.  
            String ip = inetAddress.getHostAddress();//è¿”å›IPåœ°å€çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å½¢å¼  
  
            //è·å–è¿æ¥ä¸Šå¥—æ¥å­—çš„ä¸»æœºçš„ç«¯å£å·  
            int port = socket.getPort();  
            System.out.println(ip + ":" + port + "å·²è¿æ¥");  
  
            int len = 0;  
            byte[] arr = new byte[128];//ç”¨äºåšè¾“å…¥æµçš„ä¸€ä¸ªç¼“å†²æš‚å­˜æ•°ç»„  
            InputStream in = socket.getInputStream();//ä»å¥—æ¥å­—ä¸­è·å–è¾“å…¥æµ  
  
            //åªè¦æ²¡æœ‰è¯»åˆ°æœ«å°¾ï¼Œå°±ä¸€ç›´æ‰“å°  
            while ((len = in.read(arr)) != -1) {//æŠŠæµä¸­çš„å†…å®¹è¯»å¸¦arrä¸­ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¿”å›æœ¬æ¬¡è¯»åˆ°çš„é•¿åº¦  
                String str = new String(arr, 0, len);//è¯»åˆ°å¤šå°‘ä¸ªå°±æŠŠå¤šå°‘ä¸ªè½¬æ¢æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œ  
                System.out.println(str);//å¹¶ä¸”æ‰“å°  
            }  
  
            //å…³é—­å¥—æ¥å­—  
            socket.close();  
        } catch (Exception e) {  
            e.printStackTrace();  
        }  
    }  
}

package reflection;  
  
import java.io.FileReader;  
import java.lang.reflect.Method;  
import java.util.Properties;  
  
public class Test {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception{  
        //è·å–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶  
        Properties properties = new Properties();  
        properties.load(new FileReader("ReflectionTest.properties"));  
        String myClass = properties.getProperty("myClass");  
        String myMethod = properties.getProperty("myMethod");  
        System.out.println(myClass + ":" + myMethod);  
  
  
  
        //è·å–å­—èŠ‚ç ä¿¡æ¯  
        Class c = Class.forName(myClass);  
        //åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡,è°ƒç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªé»˜è®¤æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•  
        Object o = c.newInstance();  
        System.out.println(o instanceof Student);  
  
        //è·å–æ–¹æ³•  
        Method method = c.getMethod(myMethod, null);  
        method.invoke(o, null);  
  
  
    }  
}

package reflection.fieldoperate;  
  
public class Student {  
    String name;  
    Integer age;  
    String gender;  
  
    public Student() {  
  
    }  
  
    public Student(String name, Integer age, String gender) {  
        this.name = name;  
        this.age = age;  
        this.gender = gender;  
    }  
  
    @Override  
    public String toString() {  
        return "Student{" +  
                "name='" + name + '\'' +  
                ", age=" + age +  
                ", gender='" + gender + '\'' +  
                '}';  
    }  
  
    public void study() {  
        System.out.println("i am learning amazing java...");  
    }  
  
    public String getName() {  
        return name;  
    }  
  
    public void setName(String name) {  
        this.name = name;  
    }  
  
    public Integer getAge() {  
        return age;  
    }  
  
    public void setAge(Integer age) {  
        this.age = age;  
    }  
  
    public String getGender() {  
        return gender;  
    }  
  
    public void setGender(String gender) {  
        this.gender = gender;  
    }  
}

package reflection.functionoperate;

import java.lang.reflect.Method;  
  
public class Test {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {  
        //è·å–ä»£è¡¨å­—èŠ‚ç æ–‡ä»¶çš„Classå¯¹è±¡  
        Class c = Class.forName("reflection.functionoperate.Student");  
        //ä½¿ç”¨æœ‰å‚æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡  
        Constructor constructor = c.getConstructor(String.class, Integer.class, String.class);  
        Object o = constructor.newInstance("ç‹æ–‡é¹", 24, "ç”·");  
        //è·å–æ–¹æ³•  
        Method study0 = c.getMethod("study", null);  
        Method study = c.getMethod("study", String.class);  
        //ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•  
        study0.invoke(o,null);  
        study.invoke(o, "java developing");  
    }  
}

FieldandFunction.java é€šè¿‡åå°„è·å–åˆ° set å’Œ get æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç„¶åå¯¹å±æ€§è¿›è¡Œè®¾ç½®

package reflection;  
  
import java.lang.reflect.Method;  
  
public class FieldandFunction {  
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {  
        // è·å–å­—èŠ‚ç æ–‡ä»¶  
        Class<?> c = Class.forName("reflection.fieldoperate.Student");  
  
        // åˆ›å»ºStudentç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡  
        Object stu = c.newInstance();  
  
        // è·å–setå’Œgetæ–¹æ³•å¯¹åº”çš„Methodç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡  
        Method setName = c.getMethod("setName", String.class);  
        Method getName = c.getMethod("getName");  
  
        // è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•  
        setName.invoke(stu, "Bob");  
        System.out.println(stu);  
        System.out.println(getName.invoke(stu));  
    }  
}

LambdaExpressionTest.java

import java.util.ArrayList;  
import java.util.Collections;  
import java.util.Comparator;  
import java.util.function.Consumer;  
  
public class LambdaExpressionTest {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        //ä½¿ç”¨åŒ¿åå†…éƒ¨ç±»åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹  
        Thread thread = new Thread(new Runnable() {  
            @Override  
            public void run() {  
                System.out.println("hello minecraft");  
            }  
        });  
        thread.start();  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨lambdaé‡æ„  
        System.out.println("ä½¿ç”¨lambdaé‡æ„");  
        new Thread(() -> {  
            System.out.println("hello minecraft new");  
        }).start();  
  
  
  
        //å¯¹ArrayListä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ è¿›è¡Œæ’åº  
        ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();  
        list.add("a");  
        list.add("ab");  
        list.add("abc");  
        list.add("abcd");  
  
        Collections.sort(list, new Comparator<String>() {  
            @Override  
            public int compare(String o1, String o2) {  
                return o1.length() - o2.length();  
            }  
        });  
        System.out.println(list);  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨ lambda é‡æ„  
        System.out.println("ä½¿ç”¨lambdaé‡æ„");  
        Collections.sort(list,(String o1, String o2) -> {  
            return o1.length() - o2.length();  
        });  
        System.out.println(list);  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨forEachéå†  
        list.forEach(new Consumer<String>() {  
            @Override  
            public void accept(String s) {  
                System.out.println(s);  
            }  
        });  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨lambdaé‡æ„  
        System.out.println("ä½¿ç”¨lambdaé‡æ„");  
        list.forEach((String s) -> {  
            System.out.println(s);  
        });  
    }  
}

public class FunctionInterfaceTest {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        HashMap<String, Object> map = new HashMap<>();  
        map.put("name", "ç‹æ–‡é¹");  
        map.put("age", 24);  
        map.put("gender","ç”·");  
  
        map.forEach((k, v) -> System.out.println(k + ":" + v));  
  
        ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();  
        list.add("1");  
        list.add("22");  
        list.add("333");  
        list.add("4444");  
        list.add("55555");  
        list.add("666666");  
  
        list.removeIf((String item) -> item.length() < 5);  
        System.out.println(list);  
  
    }  
}

map çš„ forEach ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨äº† BiConsumer å‡½æ•°å‹æ¥å£

public void forEach(BiConsumer<? super K, ? super V> action) {  
    Node<K,V>[] tab;  
    if (action == null)  
        throw new NullPointerException();  
    if (size > 0 && (tab = table) != null) {  
        int mc = modCount;  
        for (int i = 0; i < tab.length; ++i) {  
            for (Node<K,V> e = tab[i]; e != null; e = e.next)  
                action.accept(e.key, e.value);  
        }  
        if (modCount != mc)  
            throw new ConcurrentModificationException();  
    }  
}

Apple.java

package practice;  
  
public class Apple {  
    private Integer weight;  
    private String color;  
      
    //æ— å‚æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•  
  
    public Apple() {  
    }  
  
    //æœ‰å‚æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•  
  
    public Apple(Integer weight, String color) {  
        this.weight = weight;  
        this.color = color;  
    }  
  
  
    //getå’Œsetæ–¹æ³•  
  
    public Integer getWeight() {  
        return weight;  
    }  
  
    public void setWeight(Integer weight) {  
        this.weight = weight;  
    }  
  
    public String getColor() {  
        return color;  
    }  
  
    public void setColor(String color) {  
        this.color = color;  
    }  
  
    //toStringæ–¹æ³•  
  
    @Override  
    public String toString() {  
        return "Apple{" +  
                "weight=" + weight +  
                ", color='" + color + '\'' +  
                '}';  
    }  
}

ComparatorCompund.java

import practice.Apple;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Comparator;

public class ComparatorCompund {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ArrayList<Apple> list = new ArrayList<>();
        list.add(new Apple(150,"red"));
        list.add(new Apple(210,"red"));
        list.add(new Apple(300,"yellow"));
        list.add(new Apple(90,"green"));
        list.add(new Apple(90,"yellow"));
        list.add(new Apple(100,"green"));
        list.add(new Apple(123,"red"));

        //æ¯”è¾ƒå™¨å¤åˆçš„ä½¿ç”¨
        //æŒ‰ç…§è‹¹æœçš„é‡é‡ä»å°åˆ°å¤§è¿›è¡Œæ’åº,ç„¶ååœ¨ç”¨é¢œè‰²è¿›è¡Œç”Ÿåºæ’åº
        /*
        list.sort(Comparator.comparing(Apple::getWeight)
                .reversed()
                .thenComparing(Apple::getColor));
        System.out.println(list);
        */

        //æŒ‰ç…§è‹¹æœçš„é‡é‡é€†åºè¿›è¡Œæ’åº,ç„¶åå†ç”¨é¢œè‰²è¿›è¡Œé™åºæ’åº
        // A B C D E F G H I G K L M N O P Q R S T U V  W X Y  Z
        list.sort(Comparator.comparing(Apple::getWeight)
                .reversed()
                .thenComparing(Comparator.comparing(Apple::getColor)
                        .reversed()));
        list.forEach(System.out::println);
    }
}

Comparator.comparing()çš„æ€»ç»“:

  • ç®€åŒ–ä½œç”¨ï¼šå¯ä»¥æŠŠä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°çš„ lambda è¡¨è¾¾å¼è½¬æ¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°çš„ï¼Œè¿›è€Œæœ‰å¯èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•å¼•ç”¨
  • æ¯”è¾ƒå™¨å¤åˆä½œç”¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”è¾ƒå™¨çš„åŸºç¡€ä¸Šå†è¿›è¡Œæ›´ä¸ºå¤æ‚çš„æ¯”è¾ƒã€‚

PredicateCompund.java

import practice.Apple;  
  
import java.util.ArrayList;  
import java.util.function.Predicate;  
  
public class PredicateCompund {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        ArrayList<Apple> list = new ArrayList<>();  
        list.add(new Apple(150,"red"));  
        list.add(new Apple(210,"red"));  
        list.add(new Apple(300,"yellow"));  
        list.add(new Apple(90,"green"));  
        list.add(new Apple(90,"yellow"));  
        list.add(new Apple(100,"green"));  
        list.add(new Apple(123,"red"));  
  
        Predicate<Apple> redApple = item -> item.getColor().equals("red");  
        //åˆ é™¤éçº¢è‹¹æœ  
        list.removeIf(redApple.negate());  
        list.forEach(System.out::println);  
        //åˆ é™¤çº¢è‰²å¹¶ä¸”é‡é‡å¤§äº150çš„è‹¹æœ  
        list.removeIf(redApple.and(o -> o.getWeight() > 150));  
        //å»é™¤çº¢è‰²å¹¶ä¸”é‡é‡å¤§äº150çš„è‹¹æœæˆ–ç»¿è‹¹æœ  
        //æœ‰ç»“åˆé¡ºåº,å‰é¢ä¸¤ä¸ªä¼šå…ˆç»“åˆï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯ ( and ) or        list.removeIf(redApple  
                .and(apple -> apple.getWeight() > 150)  
                .or(apple -> apple.getColor().equals("green")));  
    }  
}

Streamæ˜¯Java 8ä¸­å¤„ç†é›†åˆçš„å…³é”®æŠ½è±¡æ¦‚å¿µï¼Œå®ƒå¯ä»¥æŒ‡å®šä½ å¸Œæœ›å¯¹é›†åˆè¿›è¡Œçš„æ“ä½œï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œéå¸¸å¤æ‚çš„æŸ¥æ‰¾ã€è¿‡æ»¤å’Œæ˜ å°„æ•°æ®ç­‰æ“ä½œã€‚ ç®€å•çš„è¯´ Stream æ‹¿æ¥ç”¨æ¥è®¡ç®—ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œä¸€ç³»åˆ—æ“ä½œçš„ä¸œè¥¿ï¼Œç”¨å®ƒæ¥æ¯”è¾ƒæ–¹ä¾¿çš„å®ç°ä¸€äº›å¤æ‚çš„æ“ä½œã€‚

  • Stream å’Œ Collection é›†åˆçš„åŒºåˆ«ï¼šCollection æ˜¯ä¸€ç§é™æ€çš„å†…å­˜æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œè€Œ Stream æ˜¯æœ‰å…³è®¡ç®—çš„ã€‚å‰è€…æ˜¯ä¸»è¦é¢å‘å†…å­˜ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨åœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­ï¼Œåè€…ä¸»è¦æ˜¯é¢å‘ CPUï¼Œé€šè¿‡ CPU å®ç°è®¡ç®—ã€‚
  • Stream è‡ªå·±ä¸ä¼šå­˜å‚¨å…ƒç´ ï¼›

CreateAndUse.java

import java.util.ArrayList;  
import java.util.Arrays;  
import java.util.HashSet;  
import java.util.stream.Stream;  
  
public class CreateAndUse {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();  
        list.add("stay");  
        list.add(" hungry");  
        list.add(" ,");  
        list.add(" stay");  
        list.add(" foolish");  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨æ™®é€šfor  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨å¢å¼ºfor  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨è¿­ä»£å™¨  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨ forEach        
        list.stream().forEach(item -> System.out.print(item));  
        System.out.println("******************************");  
  
  
        HashSet<String> set = new HashSet<>();  
        set.add("Java");  
        set.add("web");  
        set.add("Mysql");  
        set.stream().forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("------------------------------");  
  
        Integer[] arr = new Integer[]{1, 2, 3};  
        //æ•°ç»„ --> Streamæµ  
        Arrays.stream(arr).forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^");  
        //å¯å˜å‚æ•°çš„æœ¬è´¨æ˜¯æ•°ç»„  
        Stream.of("aaaa", "2222", "djaofja").forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&");  
  
        //åˆ›å»ºæ— é™æµ  
        //limitæ˜¯ç”¨æ¥é™åˆ¶æ•°é‡çš„ï¼Œè¦ä¸ç„¶å°±ä¼šæ— é™æ‰“å°  
  
        //ä»0å¼€å§‹ï¼Œæ‰“å°10ä¸ªå¶æ•°  
        Stream.iterate(0, i -> i + 2).limit(10).forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$");  
        //ç”Ÿæˆ10ä¸ª 0-9çš„éšæœºæ•°  
        Stream.generate(() -> (int) (Math.random() * 10)).limit(10).forEach(System.out::println);  
    }  
}

CommonOperate.java

import java.util.ArrayList;  
  
public class CommonOperate {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();  
        list.add("Hello");  
        list.add("World");  
        list.add("aaa");  
        list.add("aaa");  
        list.add("bbb");  
  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨ distinctå‡½æ•°è¿›è¡Œå»é‡  
        //æŠŠ listå»é‡ï¼Œä¿å­˜åˆ° newlistä¸­  
        ArrayList<String> newlist = new ArrayList<>();  
        list.stream()  
                .distinct()//å»é‡å‡½æ•°  
                .forEach(item -> newlist.add(item));  
        newlist.forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("-------------------------");  
        //ä½¿ç”¨ filterå‡½æ•°è¿›è¡Œè¿‡æ»¤  
        list.stream()  
                .filter(item -> !item.startsWith("a"))  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("*************************");  
        //æ‰“å°é•¿åº¦å¤§äº 4 çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²  
        list.stream()  
                .filter(item -> item.length() > 4)  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&");  
        //limit() æˆªæ–­æµï¼Œé™åˆ¶æ•°é‡  
        list.stream()  
                .limit(1)  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^");  
        //è·³è¿‡  
        list.stream()  
                .skip(2)  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$");  
        //å¯¹ streamæµçš„æ“ä½œä¸ä¼šå½±å“ åŸé›†åˆ  
        list.forEach(System.out::println);  
    }  
}

CommonOperate2.java

package basicuse;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Arrays;

public class CommonOperate2 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();
        list.add("Hello");
        list.add("World");
        list.add("aaa");
        list.add("aaa");
        list.add("bbb");
        //æ‰“å°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦
        //ä½¿ç”¨ lambda è¡¨è¾¾å¼
        list.stream()
                .map(s -> s.length())//æŠŠæµä¸­å…ƒç´ æ˜ å°„æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„é•¿åº¦
                .forEach(s -> System.out.println(s));
        System.out.println("------------------------");
        //ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•å¼•ç”¨
        list.stream()
                .map(String::length)
                .forEach(System.out::println);

        System.out.println("$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$");
        list.stream()
                //æŠŠæµä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ (æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯Stringç±»å‹)è¿›è¡Œåˆ‡å‰²
                //åˆ‡å‰²å®Œäº†ä¹‹åæµä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½å˜æˆäº† String[] ç±»å‹
                //æµå¼€å§‹: String[],String[],String[],String[],String[] : æµç»“æŸ
                //æµå¼€å§‹: ["h","e","l","l","o"], [...], [...], [...], [...] : æµç»“æŸ
                .map(str -> str.split(""))

                //æŠŠæµä¸­çš„ String[] ç±»å‹çš„å…ƒç´ éƒ½å˜æˆæµï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åˆå¹¶
                //åˆå¹¶ä¹‹åæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæµï¼Œä¸”æµä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯ String ç±»å‹çš„ å•ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
                //æµå¼€å§‹: "h","e","l","l","o","w","o","r","l","d"...... : æµç»“æŸ
                .flatMap(strArr -> Arrays.stream(strArr))
                
                //æŠŠæµä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ‹¿å‡ºæ¥ã€‚è¿”å›ç¬¬ nä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼ˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç±»å‹ï¼‰çš„ç¬¬0å·ä½ç½®çš„ char value
                .map(str -> str.charAt(0))
                .forEach(System.out::println);
    }
}

CommonOperate3.java

package basicuse;  
  
import java.util.ArrayList;  
  
public class CommonOperate3 {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        ArrayList<Student> list = new ArrayList<>();  
        list.add(new Student("wwp",24,"ç”·"));  
        list.add(new Student("ls",24, "å¥³"));  
        list.add(new Student("ww",24, "ç”·"));  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨ lambda è¡¨è¾¾å¼  
        list.stream()  
                .map(item -> item.getName())  
                .forEach(item -> System.out.println(item));  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•å¼•ç”¨  
        list.stream()  
                .map(Student::getName)  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
    }  
}

CommonOperate4.java

package basicuse;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Optional;

public class CommonOperate4 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();
        list.add("Hello");
        list.add("World");
        list.add("aaa");
        list.add("aaa");
        list.add("bbb");

        //åˆ¤æ–­é›†åˆä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„é•¿åº¦æ˜¯å¦éƒ½>=5--ä¼ ç»Ÿæ–¹å¼
        boolean flag = true; //è®¾ç½®æ ‡è¯†ä½ï¼Œé»˜è®¤æ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ >=5 çš„
        for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++) {
            if (list.get(i).length() < 5) {
                flag = false;
                break;
            }
        }
        System.out.println(flag);

        System.out.println("????????????????????????");

        //è¿™äº›æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³•å‡ä¸ºç»ˆç«¯æ“ä½œ
        //æµä¸­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨å…ƒç´ çš„é•¿åº¦ >= 5 çš„å…ƒç´ 
        System.out.println(list.stream().anyMatch(s -> s.length() >= 5));
        //æµä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ æ˜¯å¦éƒ½é•¿åº¦ >= 5
        System.out.println(list.stream().allMatch(s -> s.length() >= 5));
        //æµä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ é•¿åº¦æ˜¯å¦éƒ½ä¸æ»¡è¶³é•¿åº¦ >= 5
        System.out.println(list.stream().noneMatch(s -> s.length() >= 5));
        //è¿”å›æµä¸­çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
        Optional optional = list.stream().findFirst();
        System.out.println(optional.get());
        //findAny()    è¿”å›å½“å‰æµä¸­çš„ä»»æ„å…ƒç´ 
    }
}

CommonOperate5.java

package basicuse;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Optional;

public class CommonOperate5 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ArrayList<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();
        list.add(500);
        list.add(10);
        list.add(5);
        list.add(5);

        //0:è®¾ç½®åˆå§‹å€¼ä¸º 0
        Integer sum = list.stream().reduce(0, (a,b) -> a + b);
        System.out.println(sum);

        //0:è®¾ç½®åˆå§‹å€¼ä¸º 0
        Integer sum1 = list.stream().reduce(0, (a,b) -> Integer.sum(a, b));
        System.out.println(sum);

        //0:è®¾ç½®åˆå§‹å€¼ä¸º 0
        Integer sum2 = list.stream().reduce(0, Integer::sum);
        System.out.println(sum2);

        //ä½¿ç”¨ Optional è€ƒè™‘åˆ°æµä¸­æ²¡æœ‰å…ƒç´ çš„æƒ…å†µ
        Optional optional = list.stream().reduce((a, b) -> a + b);
        System.out.println(optional.get());

        //æ‹¼æ¥é¦–å­—æ¯
        ArrayList<String> list2 = new ArrayList<>();
        list2.add("who am i");
        list2.add("who are you");
        list2.add("pengpeng");

        String finalStr = list2.stream()
                .map(str -> str.substring(0, 1))
                .reduce("", (s1, s2) -> s1 + s2);
        System.out.println(finalStr);

    }
}

CommonOperate6.java

package basicuse;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class CommonOperate6 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ArrayList<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();
        list.add(500);
        list.add(10);
        list.add(5);
        list.add(5);

        //æ±‚æœ€å¤§å€¼
        //ä½¿ç”¨ä¸‰å…ƒè¿ç®—ç¬¦å®ç°,list.get(0)çš„æ„æ€æ˜¯é»˜è®¤è®¾ç½® 0 å·å…ƒç´ æ˜¯æœ€å¤§å€¼
        Integer max0 = list.stream()
                .reduce(list.get(0), (a, b) -> a >= b ? a : b);
        System.out.println(max0);

        System.out.println("$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$");
        //ä½¿ç”¨ Integer maxæ–¹æ³•å®ç°
        Integer max = list.stream()
                .reduce(list.get(0), Integer::max);
        System.out.println(max);

        System.out.println("-----------------------------");

        //æ±‚æœ€å°å€¼
        Integer min = list.stream()
                .reduce(list.get(0), Integer::min);
        System.out.println(min);

        System.out.println("***************************");

        //ç»Ÿè®¡ list ä¸­å…ƒç´ çš„æ•°é‡
        Integer count = list.stream()
                .map(str -> 1)
                .reduce(0, Integer::sum);
        System.out.println(count);

    }
}

CommonOperate7.java

package basicuse;  
  
import java.util.ArrayList;  
import java.util.Comparator;  
  
public class CommonOperate7 {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();  
        list.add("Hello");  
        list.add("World");  
        list.add("aaa");  
        list.add("aaaa");  
        list.add("bbb");  
        //ä½¿ç”¨streamæµå¯¹listä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ æ’åºå¹¶åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æ‰“å°  
        list.stream()  
                .sorted() //è‡ªç„¶æ’åº  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
  
        System.out.println("------------1-------------");  
  
        //ä½¿ç”¨streamæµå¯¹listä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ é•¿åº¦æ’åºå¹¶åœ¨æ§åˆ¶å°æ‰“å°  
        //ä½¿ç”¨åŒ¿åå†…éƒ¨ç±»å®ç°Comparatoræ¥å£çš„æ–¹å¼  
        list.stream()  
                .sorted(new Comparator<String>() { //å®šåˆ¶æ’åº  
                    @Override  
                    public int compare(String o1, String o2) {  
                        return o1.length() - o2.length();  
                    }  
                })  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
  
        System.out.println("------------2------------");  
        //ä½¿ç”¨ lambda è¡¨è¾¾å¼ç®€åŒ–ï¼Œlambdaè¡¨è¾¾å¼å®é™…ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯ Comparator æ¥å£çš„å®ç°å¯¹è±¡  
        list.stream()  
                .sorted((o1, o2) -> o1.length() - o2.length())  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("-----------3-------------");  
        //ä½¿ç”¨Comparator.comparingæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•è¿”å›çš„å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª Comparatoræ¥å£çš„å®ç°å¯¹è±¡  
        list.stream()  
                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(o1 -> o1.length()))  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("-----------4-------------");  
        list.stream()  
                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(o1 -> -o1.length()))  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("-----------5-------------");  
        //ç®€åŒ–ï¼Œè¿˜é¢ å€’äº†ä¸€ä¸‹é¡ºåº  
        list.stream()  
                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(String::length).reversed())  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
  
    }  
}

CommonOperate8.java

package basicuse;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Comparator;
import java.util.stream.Collectors;

public class CommonOperate8 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();
        list.add("Hello");
        list.add("World~");
        list.add("aaa");
        list.add("aaaa");
        list.add("bb");
        //è·å–å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦
        //å†™æ³•0
        Integer max = list.stream()
                .map(item -> item.length()) //æŠŠæµä¸­å…ƒç´ æ˜ å°„æˆé•¿åº¦
                .collect(Collectors.maxBy((o1, o2) -> o1.compareTo(o2))).get();
        System.out.println(max);
        //å†™æ³•1
        Integer max1 = list.stream()
                .map(item -> item.length())
                .collect(Collectors.maxBy((o1, o2) -> o1 - o2)).get();
        System.out.println(max1);
        //å†™æ³•2
        Integer max2 = list.stream()
                .map(item -> item.length())
                .collect(Collectors.maxBy((o1, o2) -> Integer.compare(o1, o2))).get();
        System.out.println(max2);
        //å†™æ³•3
        Integer max3 = list.stream()
                .map(item -> item.length())
                .collect(Collectors.maxBy(Integer::compare)).get();
        System.out.println(max3);
        //å†™æ³•4
        Integer max4 = list.stream()
                .map(item -> item.length())
                .collect(Collectors.maxBy(Comparator.comparing(len -> len))).get();
        System.out.println(max4);
        //è·å–å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æœ€å°é•¿åº¦
        Integer min = list.stream()
                .map(item -> item.length())
                .collect(Collectors.minBy(Integer::compare)).get();
        System.out.println(min);
        //æ±‚æ‰€æœ‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦çš„æ€»å’Œ
        //å†™æ³•1:
        Integer sumLength = list.stream()
                .map(item -> item.length())
                .collect(Collectors.summingInt(len -> len));
        System.out.println("æ‰€æœ‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦çš„æ€»å’Œ:" + sumLength);
        //å†™æ³•2
        Integer sumLength2 = list.stream()
                .collect(Collectors.summingInt(s -> s.length()));
        System.out.println("æ‰€æœ‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦çš„æ€»å’Œ:" + sumLength2);
        //å†™æ³•3
        Integer sumLength3 = list.stream()
                .collect(Collectors.summingInt(String::length));
        System.out.println("æ‰€æœ‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦çš„æ€»å’Œ:" + sumLength3);
    }
}

CommonOperate10. ä½¿ç”¨ Collectors.groupingBy è¿›è¡Œåˆ†ç»„

package basicuse;  
  
import java.util.ArrayList;  
import java.util.List;  
import java.util.Map;  
import java.util.stream.Collectors;  
  
public class CommonOperate10 {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        ArrayList<Student> list = new ArrayList<>();  
        list.add(new Student("wwp",24,"ç”·"));  
        list.add(new Student("ls",24, "å¥³"));  
        list.add(new Student("ww",24, "ç”·"));  
  
        Map<String, List<Student>> set = list.stream()  
                .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(s -> s.getGender()));  
  
        set.forEach((k,v) -> System.out.println(k + "\t" + v));  
  
  
  
    }  
}

ç»ƒä¹ 

Trader.java

package Exercises;  
  
import java.util.Objects;  
  
public class Trader {  
    private final String name;  
    private final String city;  
      
    public Trader(String n, String c){  
        this.name = n;  
        this.city = c;  
    }  
    //get set toString  
  
    public String getName() {  
        return name;  
    }  
  
    public String getCity() {  
        return city;  
    }  
  
    @Override  
    public String toString() {  
        return "Trader{" +  
                "name='" + name + '\'' +  
                ", city='" + city + '\'' +  
                '}';  
    }  
  
    @Override  
    public boolean equals(Object o) {  
        if (this == o) return true;  
        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;  
        Trader trader = (Trader) o;  
        return Objects.equals(name, trader.name) && Objects.equals(city, trader.city);  
    }  
  
    @Override  
    public int hashCode() {  
        return Objects.hash(name, city);  
    }  
}

Transaction.java

package Exercises;  
  
public class Transaction {  
    private final Trader trader;  
    private final Integer year;  
    private final Integer value;  
      
    public Transaction(Trader trader, int year, int value){  
        this.trader = trader;  
        this.year = year;  
        this.value = value;  
    }  
    //get set toString  
  
    public Trader getTrader() {  
        return trader;  
    }  
  
    public Integer getYear() {  
        return year;  
    }  
  
    public Integer getValue() {  
        return value;  
    }  
  
    @Override  
    public String toString() {  
        return "Transaction{" +  
                "trader=" + trader +  
                ", year=" + year +  
                ", value=" + value +  
                '}';  
    }  
}

Test.java

package Exercises;  
  
import java.util.Arrays;  
import java.util.Comparator;  
import java.util.HashSet;  
import java.util.List;  
  
public class Test {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
        Trader raoul = new Trader("Raoul", "Cambridge");  
        Trader mario = new Trader("Mario","Milan");  
        Trader alan = new Trader("Alan","Cambridge");  
        Trader brian = new Trader("Brian","Cambridge");  
        List<Transaction> transactions = Arrays.asList(  
                new Transaction(brian, 2011, 300),  
                new Transaction(raoul, 2012, 1000),  
                new Transaction(raoul, 2011, 400),  
                new Transaction(mario, 2012, 710),  
                new Transaction(mario, 2012, 700),  
                new Transaction(alan, 2012, 950)  
        );  
        /**  
         * (1) æ‰¾å‡º2011å¹´å‘ç”Ÿçš„æ‰€æœ‰äº¤æ˜“ï¼Œå¹¶æŒ‰äº¤æ˜“é¢æ’åºï¼ˆä»ä½åˆ°é«˜ï¼‰ã€‚  
         * (2) äº¤æ˜“å‘˜éƒ½åœ¨å“ªäº›ä¸åŒçš„åŸå¸‚å·¥ä½œè¿‡ï¼Ÿ

        System.out.println("æ‰¾å‡º2011å¹´å‘ç”Ÿçš„æ‰€æœ‰äº¤æ˜“ï¼Œå¹¶æŒ‰äº¤æ˜“é¢æ’åºï¼ˆä»ä½åˆ°é«˜ï¼‰");  
        System.out.println("----------ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åº---------------");  
        //å†™æ³•1  
        transactions.stream()  
                .filter(item -> item.getYear().equals(2011))  
                .sorted((item1, item2) -> item1.getValue() - item2.getValue())//Transcationç±»æ²¡æœ‰å†™è¿‡è‡ªç„¶æ’åºï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿™é‡Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¾—ç”¨å®šåˆ¶æ’åº  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        //å†™æ³•2  
        transactions.stream()  
                .filter(item -> item.getYear().equals(2011))  
                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(transaction -> transaction.getValue()))  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        //å†™æ³•3  
        transactions.stream()  
                .filter(item -> item.getYear().equals(2011))  
                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(Transaction::getValue))  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("----------ä»å¤§åˆ°å°æ’åº---------------");  
        //å†™æ³•1  
        transactions.stream()  
                .filter(item -> item.getYear().equals(2011))  
                .sorted((item1, item2) -> -(item1.getValue() - item2.getValue()))//ä»å¤§åˆ°å°æ’åº  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        //å†™æ³•2  
        transactions.stream()

                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(Transaction::getValue).reversed())//ä»å¤§åˆ°å°æ’åº  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        //å†™æ³•3  
        transactions.stream()  
                .filter(item -> item.getYear().equals(2011))

        System.out.println("äº¤æ˜“å‘˜éƒ½åœ¨å“ªäº›ä¸åŒçš„åŸå¸‚å·¥ä½œè¿‡ï¼Ÿ");  
        //å†™æ³•1  
        transactions.stream()  
                .map(item -> item.getTrader())//æŠŠæµä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ æ˜ å°„æˆ Trader å¯¹è±¡  
                .map(item -> item.getCity())//æŠŠæµä¸­å…ƒç´ æ˜ å°„æˆ city å­—ç¬¦ä¸²  
                .distinct()//å¯¹ String ç±»å¯¹è±¡å»é‡æ—¶ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨çš„æ˜¯ Stringç±»çš„equalså’Œhashcodeæ–¹æ³•åˆ¤æ–­çš„  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        //å†™æ³•2--ä¼ ç»Ÿæ–¹æ³•  
        HashSet<String> citys = new HashSet<>();  
        for (int i = 0; i < transactions.size(); i++) {

        //å†™æ³•1(æ‰“å°åå­—)  
        transactions.stream()  
                .map(item -> item.getTrader())//æŠŠæµä¸­å…ƒç´ æ˜ å°„æˆ äº¤æ˜“å‘˜  
                .filter(item -> item.getCity().equals("Cambridge"))//ç­›é€‰å‡ºåªæ˜¯å‰‘æ¡¥çš„äº¤æ˜“å‘˜  
                .distinct()  
                .map(item -> item.getName())  
                .sorted()  
                .forEach(System.out::println);

                .map(Transaction::getTrader)  
                .filter(item -> item.getCity().equals("Cambridge"))//ç­›é€‰å‡ºåªæ˜¯å‰‘æ¡¥çš„äº¤æ˜“å‘˜  
                .distinct()//å¯¹ Trader ç±»å¯¹è±¡å»é‡æ—¶ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨çš„æ˜¯ Traderçš„equalså’ŒhashCodeæ–¹æ³•åˆ¤æ–­çš„å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰  
                .sorted((o1, o2) -> o1.getName().compareTo(o2.getName()))  
                .forEach(System.out::println);

        transactions.stream()  
                .map(Transaction::getTrader)  
                .filter(item -> item.getCity().equals("Cambridge"))//ç­›é€‰å‡ºåªæ˜¯å‰‘æ¡¥çš„äº¤æ˜“å‘˜  
                .distinct()//å¯¹ Trader ç±»å¯¹è±¡å»é‡æ—¶ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨çš„æ˜¯ Traderçš„equalså’ŒhashCodeæ–¹æ³•åˆ¤æ–­çš„å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰  
                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(o1 -> o1.getName()))  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        //å†™æ³•4(æ‰“å°å¯¹è±¡)  
        transactions.stream()  
                .map(Transaction::getTrader)  
                .filter(item -> item.getCity().equals("Cambridge"))//ç­›é€‰å‡ºåªæ˜¯å‰‘æ¡¥çš„äº¤æ˜“å‘˜  
                .distinct()//å¯¹ Trader ç±»å¯¹è±¡å»é‡æ—¶ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨çš„æ˜¯ Traderçš„equalså’ŒhashCodeæ–¹æ³•åˆ¤æ–­çš„å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰  
                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(Trader::getName))  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("è¿”å›æ‰€æœ‰äº¤æ˜“å‘˜çš„å§“åå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ŒæŒ‰å­—æ¯é¡ºåºæ’åºã€‚");  
        transactions.stream()  
                .map(item -> item.getTrader().getName())//æŠŠæµä¸­å…ƒç´ æ˜ å°„æˆ äº¤æ˜“å‘˜çš„å§“å  
                .distinct()  
                .sorted()  
                .forEach(System.out::println);  
        System.out.println("æœ‰æ²¡æœ‰äº¤æ˜“å‘˜æ˜¯åœ¨ç±³å…°å·¥ä½œçš„ï¼Ÿ");  
        System.out.println(transactions.stream()  
                .map(item -> item.getTrader().getCity())//æŠŠæµä¸­å…ƒç´ æ˜ å°„æˆ äº¤æ˜“å‘˜çš„åŸå¸‚  
                .anyMatch(str -> str.equals("Milan")));  
        System.out.println("æ‰“å°ç”Ÿæ´»åœ¨å‰‘æ¡¥çš„äº¤æ˜“å‘˜çš„æ‰€æœ‰äº¤æ˜“é¢ã€‚");  
        Integer sum = transactions.stream()  
                .filter(item -> item.getTrader().getCity().equals("Cambridge"))  
                .map(item -> item.getValue())  
                .reduce(0, (v1, v2) -> v1 + v2);  
        System.out.println(sum);  
        System.out.println("æ‰€æœ‰äº¤æ˜“ä¸­ï¼Œæœ€é«˜çš„äº¤æ˜“é¢æ˜¯å¤šå°‘ï¼Ÿ");  
        Integer max = transactions.stream()  
                .map(item -> item.getValue())  
                .reduce((a, b) -> Integer.max(a, b)).get();  
        System.out.println(max);  
        System.out.println("æ‰€æœ‰äº¤æ˜“ä¸­ï¼Œæœ€å°çš„äº¤æ˜“é¢æ˜¯å¤šå°‘ï¼Ÿ");  
  
        Integer min = transactions.stream()  
                .map(item -> item.getValue())  
                .reduce(Integer::min).get();  
        System.out.println(min);  
    }

CommonOperate9.java

package Exercises;  
  
import java.util.Arrays;  
import java.util.Comparator;  
import java.util.List;  
import java.util.Set;  
import java.util.stream.Collectors;  
  
public class CommonOperate9 {  
    public static void main(String[] args) {  
  
        Trader raoul = new Trader("Raoul", "Cambridge");  
        Trader mario = new Trader("Mario","Milan");  
        Trader alan = new Trader("Alan","Cambridge");  
        Trader brian = new Trader("Brian","Cambridge");  
        List<Transaction> transactions = Arrays.asList(  
                new Transaction(brian, 2011, 300),  
                new Transaction(raoul, 2012, 1000),  
                new Transaction(raoul, 2011, 400),  
                new Transaction(mario, 2012, 710),  
                new Transaction(mario, 2012, 700),  
                new Transaction(alan, 2012, 950)  
        );  
        long count = transactions.stream().count();  
        System.out.println("äº¤æ˜“çš„æ•°é‡" + count);  
  
        System.out.println("äº¤æ˜“æœ€å¤§é¢");  
        //å†™æ³•1  
        Transaction max = transactions.stream()  
                .max((o1, o2) -> o1.getValue() - o2.getValue())  
                .get();  
        System.out.println("æœ€å¤§é¢:" + max);  
        //å†™æ³•2  
        Transaction max2 = transactions.stream()  
                .max(Comparator.comparing(o1 -> o1.getValue()))  
                .get();  
        System.out.println("æœ€å¤§é¢" + max2);  
        //å†™æ³•3  
        Transaction max3 = transactions.stream()  
                .max(Comparator.comparing(Transaction::getValue))  
                .get();  
        System.out.println("æœ€å¤§é¢" + max3);  
        System.out.println("æœ€å°é¢");  
        Transaction min = transactions.stream()  
                .min(Comparator.comparing(Transaction::getValue))  
                .get();  
        System.out.println("æœ€å°é¢" + min);  
  
        transactions.stream()  
                .forEach(item -> System.out.println(item.getTrader().getName() + "-" + item.getValue()));  
  
        //å°†è·å–æ‰€æœ‰çš„äº¤æ˜“å‘˜å§“åå¹¶å­˜æ”¾åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„é›†åˆä¸­  
        List<String> list = transactions.stream()  
                .map(item -> item.getTrader().getName())  
                .distinct()  
                .collect(Collectors.toList());  
        System.out.println(list);  
        Set<String> Set = transactions.stream()  
                .map(item -> item.getTrader().getName())  
                .distinct()  
                .collect(Collectors.toSet());  
        System.out.println(Set);  
  
    }  
}

public static void f(Season season) {
    switch (season) {
        case SPRING:
            break;
        case SUMMER:
            break;
        case AUTUMN:
            break;
        case WINTER:
            break;
    }
}

    f(Season.SPRING);
    f(Season.WINTER);
